data.text: @GovKathyHochul Let's back to basics here, end the emergency powers today, u dont need them, its endemic and u need to use your brain governor, the mask mandates, drop em, that means you all have a choice, those of you who advocate for gov. To mandate such things, beware of what u ask.
@GovKathyHochul How many of those 12 deaths were due to COVID rather than with COVID?
@pjhn22 @GovKathyHochul Masks on toddlers are like 30 year olds wearing a diaper. It’s not that you’ll never poop your pants but 99.98% of the time you’ll make it to a toilet.
@GovKathyHochul We've all been lied to. https://t.co/iEgWKUcBoU
@GovKathyHochul How about bail reform since your Covid scam has come undone

@JCinNYC @pjhn22 @GovKathyHochul He never stops, most of his links are a year old or more, it’s pathetic. And compares everything in the Worlf for safety to masks, you know, like the ridiculous seatbelt comparison 😂
